person.persName: Charles Bridges Pearce (Mason County, Kentucky, merchant and banker)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, merchant and banker. Fleming County, Kentucky native. Son of William Pearce and Mary Bridges Pearce. Married to Maria Shultz Pearce in Mason County, Kentucky on October 26, 1848. Father of Lewis Edward Pearce, Charlotte Pearce, Christian Pearce, Charles Pearce, Lottie Pearce, and Mary Pearce. Dry goods merchant in partnership with Lewis C. Pearce and Hiram T. Pearce in Mason County from 1840 to 1844. Merchant in Mason County in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Mason County in 1850. Merchant in partnership with Joseph Wallingford in Mason County from 1860 to 1866. Owned five enslaved persons in Mason County in 1860. Broker in Mason County in 1863.
